meta.description: Optimize the meal plan to meet nutritional requirements at minimum cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food options for the meal plan.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams for each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams for each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content for each food item.

params.name: price
params.description: Price of each food item in dollars.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units to purchase for each food item.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(price[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 59 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 160 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1809 calories are consumed.
